required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Dose Escalation Study of IBI302 in Patients With Wet Age-related Macular Degeneration
clinical_study.official_title: A Dose Escalation Phase I Clinical Study to Evaluate the Tolerability and Safety of IBI302 in Patients With Wet Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD)

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed for single-center, open-label, dose escalation phase I trial to evaluate the safety and tolerability of a single intravitreal injection of IBI302 in patients with wet AMD.

primary_outcome.description: Decreasing of BCVA; b) Changes in intraocular pressure compared with baseline; c) Incidence, relatedness and severity of all adverse events, treatment emergent adverse events and serious adverse events;

secondary_outcome.description: Changes in central subfield thickness by OCT compared with baseline; b) Changes in CNV area by FA compared with baseline; c) Changes in BCVA compared with baseline.
Positive rate of anti-drug antibody and neutralizing antibody

secondary_outcome.measure: The area under the drug-time curve from 0 to time t (AUC0-t)
The area under the curve at the time of 0-infinity (AUC0-∞)
